'''Adventurer's Bandana''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Adventurer]].

==Description==
There is nothing special about this green bandana, save that the fabric is rather robust and highly absorbent.<br>Just like the bandana, its wearer was an unexceptional, ordinary person.<br>But countless secrets lie hidden in the stars high up above and the abyss deep down below.<br>All of these things are awaiting discovery by mere mortals.
